title: Bomber Crew-PLAZA
description:
P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S

Bomber Crew (c) Curve Digital

Release Date: 11/2017 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Simulation

Prepare your crew for their most dangerous mission yet and go chocks
away for a sky-bound expedition in this strategic survival sim
Bomber Crew. Choose your Crew! Train and personalise your own
Bomber Crew. Procedurally-generated names, skills and back stories
means a unique experience for everyone, but be careful, as death is
permanent. Immersive flight simulation!

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/537800/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

Note: This Release includes the DLC Bomber Crew Skin Pack
and Update #2

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX - STEAMPUNKS - CPY - SiMPLEX - ACTiVATED

Coming soon
